item.title: Retrieving Access Token for Service Account using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for retrieving the access token for Service Account using Google Apps Script. The flow for using this script is as follows. At first, please create the Service Account and retrieve JSON file. Put Scopes, private_key and client_email to the script.
